      int Player.decreaseOneArmy(Country defeatedCountry)
      This function decreases one army from the defeated country every time either attacking country or defending country looses

      This method is used to perform the fortification stage in the game.

      This function gives maximum number of dice for particular attacking or defending country
      java.lang.String Player.noOfDiceOnAllOut(Country attackingCountry, Country defendingCountry)
      This function calculates number of maximum dice each gets in allout mode and then calls winner function to determine the winner
      boolean Player.reinforceArmies(Player player, Country country, int armies)
      This method is used to make changes in the number of armies in a country when the player is in the reinforcement stage.
      java.lang.String Player.winner(Country attackingCountry, Country defendingCountry, int noOfDiceForAttackingCountry, int noOFDiceForDefendingCountry, java.lang.String action)
      This function decides whether the attacking country or defending country wins
